author: Joseph Green
title: Stay at home and save on an Xbox Game Pass
description: TL;DR: A three-month subscription to an Xbox Game Pass is on sale for £9.99 on CD Keys, saving you 58% on list price. We're all being told to stay at home and isolate, which isn't a problem for a lot of gamers out there who have some experience in this. Even …
content:
TL;DR: A three-month subscription to an Xbox Game Pass is on sale for £9.99 on CD Keys, saving you 58% on list price.
We're all being told to stay at home and isolate, which isn't a problem for a lot of gamers out there who have some experience in this.
